chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
a: nat -> R

Goal:
{l : R | Un_cv (fun N : nat => sum_f_R0 a N) l} -> ex_series a

Premises:
ex_series = fun (K : AbsRing) (V : NormedModule K) (a : nat -> V) => exists l : V, is_series a l : forall (K : AbsRing) (V : NormedModule K), (nat -> V) -> Prop Arguments K, V are implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [_ _ function_scope]
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat For S: Argument scope is [nat_scope]
sum_f_R0 = fix sum_f_R0 (f : nat -> R) (N : nat) {struct N} : R := match N with | 0%nat => f 0%nat | S i => sum_f_R0 f i + f (S i) end : (nat -> R) -> nat -> R Argument scopes are [function_scope nat_scope]
Un_cv = fun (Un : nat -> R) (l : R) => forall eps : R, eps > 0 -> exists N : nat, forall n : nat, (n >= N)%nat -> R_dist (Un n) l < eps : (nat -> R) -> R -> Prop Argument scopes are [function_scope R_scope]
Inductive N : Set := N0 : N | Npos : positive -> N For Npos: Argument scope is [positive_scope]
*** [ R : Set ]
ex_series_Reals_0 : forall a : nat -> R, ex_series a -> {l : R | Un_cv (fun N : nat => sum_f_R0 a N) l}
Rseries_CV_comp : forall An Bn : nat -> R, (forall n : nat, 0 <= An n <= Bn n) -> {l : R | Un_cv (fun N : nat => sum_f_R0 Bn N) l} -> {l : R | Un_cv (fun N : nat => sum_f_R0 An N) l}
cv_cauchy_2 : forall An : nat -> R, Cauchy_crit_series An -> {l : R | Un_cv (fun N : nat => sum_f_R0 An N) l}
cv_cauchy_1 : forall An : nat -> R, {l : R | Un_cv (fun N : nat => sum_f_R0 An N) l} -> Cauchy_crit_series An
Alembert_C1 : forall An : nat -> R, (forall n : nat, 0 < An n) -> Un_cv (fun n : nat => Rabs (An (S n) / An n)) 0 -> {l : R | Un_cv (fun N : nat => sum_f_R0 An N) l}
SFL : forall fn : nat -> R -> R, (forall x : R, {l : R | Un_cv (fun N : nat => SP fn N x) l}) -> R -> R
CV_Cauchy : forall Un : nat -> R, {l : R | Un_cv Un l} -> Cauchy_crit Un
CVN_CVU : forall (fn : nat -> R -> R) (cv : forall x : R, {l : R | Un_cv (fun N : nat => SP fn N x) l}) (r : posreal), CVN_r fn r -> CVU (fun n : nat => SP fn n) (SFL fn cv) 0 r
SFL_continuity : forall (fn : nat -> R -> R) (cv : forall x : R, {l : R | Un_cv (fun N : nat => SP fn N x) l}), CVN_R fn -> (forall n : nat, continuity (fn n)) -> continuity (SFL fn cv)
Cauchy_crit_series = fun An : nat -> R => Cauchy_crit (fun N : nat => sum_f_R0 An N) : (nat -> R) -> Prop Argument scope is [function_scope]
CVN_r = fun (fn : nat -> R -> R) (r : posreal) => {An : nat -> R & {l : R | Un_cv (fun n : nat => sum_f_R0 (fun k : nat => Rabs (An k)) n) l /\ (forall (n : nat) (y : R), Boule 0 r y -> Rabs (fn n y) <= An n)}} : (nat -> R -> R) -> posreal -> Type Argument scopes are [function_scope _]
maj_by_pos : forall Un : nat -> R, {l : R | Un_cv Un l} -> exists l : R, 0 < l /\ (forall n : nat, Rabs (Un n) <= l)
tech12 : forall (An : nat -> R) (x l : R), Un_cv (fun N : nat => sum_f_R0 (fun i : nat => An i * x ^ i) N) l -> Pser An x l
sum_maj1 : forall (fn : nat -> R -> R) (An : nat -> R) (x l1 l2 : R) (N : nat), Un_cv (fun n : nat => SP fn n x) l1 -> Un_cv (fun n : nat => sum_f_R0 An n) l2 -> (forall n : nat, Rabs (fn n x) <= An n) -> Rabs (l1 - SP fn N x) <= l2 - sum_f_R0 An N
Series_correct : forall a : nat -> R, ex_series a -> is_series a (Series a)
continuity_pt_finite_SF : forall (fn : nat -> R -> R) (N : nat) (x : R), (forall n : nat, (n <= N)%nat -> continuity_pt (fn n) x) -> continuity_pt (fun y : R => sum_f_R0 (fun k : nat => fn k y) N) x
SFL_continuity_pt : forall (fn : nat -> R -> R) (cv : forall x : R, {l : R | Un_cv (fun N : nat => SP fn N x) l}) (r : posreal), CVN_r fn r -> (forall (n : nat) (y : R), Boule 0 r y -> continuity_pt (fn n) y) -> forall y : R, Boule 0 r y -> continuity_pt (SFL fn cv) y
SP = fun (fn : nat -> R -> R) (N : nat) (x : R) => sum_f_R0 (fun k : nat => fn k x) N : (nat -> R -> R) -> nat -> R -> R Argument scopes are [function_scope nat_scope R_scope]
alternated_series_ineq : forall (Un : nat -> R) (l : R) (N : nat), Un_decreasing Un -> Un_cv Un 0 -> Un_cv (fun N0 : nat => sum_f_R0 (tg_alt Un) N0) l -> sum_f_R0 (tg_alt Un) (S (2 * N)) <= l <= sum_f_R0 (tg_alt Un) (2 * N)
Alt_CVU : forall (f : nat -> R -> R) (g : R -> R) (h : nat -> R) (c : R) (r : posreal), (forall x : R, Boule c r x -> Un_decreasing (fun n : nat => f n x)) -> (forall x : R, Boule c r x -> Un_cv (fun n : nat => f n x) 0) -> (forall x : R, Boule c r x -> Un_cv (sum_f_R0 (tg_alt (fun i : nat => f i x))) (g x)) -> (forall (x : R) (n : nat), Boule c r x -> f n x <= h n) -> Un_cv h 0 -> CVU (fun (N : nat) (x : R) => sum_f_R0 (tg_alt (fun i : nat => f i x)) N) g c r
sum_cv_maj : forall (An : nat -> R) (fn : nat -> R -> R) (x l1 l2 : R), Un_cv (fun n : nat => SP fn n x) l1 -> Un_cv (fun n : nat => sum_f_R0 An n) l2 -> (forall n : nat, Rabs (fn n x) <= An n) -> Rabs l1 <= l2
Rsum_abs : forall (An : nat -> R) (N : nat), Rabs (sum_f_R0 An N) <= sum_f_R0 (fun l : nat => Rabs (An l)) N
Cesaro : forall (An Bn : nat -> R) (l : R), Un_cv Bn l -> (forall n : nat, 0 < An n) -> cv_infty (fun n : nat => sum_f_R0 An n) -> Un_cv (fun n : nat => sum_f_R0 (fun k : nat => An k * Bn k) n / sum_f_R0 An n) l
sum_n_Reals : forall (a : nat -> R_AbelianGroup) (N : nat), sum_n a N = sum_f_R0 a N
sum_incr : forall (An : nat -> R) (N : nat) (l : R), Un_cv (fun n : nat => sum_f_R0 An n) l -> (forall n : nat, 0 <= An n) -> sum_f_R0 An N <= l
ex_series_dec : forall a : nat -> R, {ex_series a} + {~ ex_series a}
tech5 : forall (An : nat -> R) (N : nat), sum_f_R0 An (S N) = sum_f_R0 An N + An (S N)
plus_sum : forall (An Bn : nat -> R) (N : nat), sum_f_R0 (fun i : nat => An i + Bn i) N = sum_f_R0 An N + sum_f_R0 Bn N
CV_ALT_step1 : forall Un : nat -> R, Un_decreasing Un -> Un_decreasing (fun N : nat => sum_f_R0 (tg_alt Un) (2 * N))
sigma = fun (f : nat -> R) (low high : nat) => sum_f_R0 (fun k : nat => f (low + k)%nat) (high - low) : (nat -> R) -> nat -> nat -> R Argument scopes are [function_scope nat_scope nat_scope]
CV_ALT_step0 : forall Un : nat -> R, Un_decreasing Un -> Un_growing (fun N : nat => sum_f_R0 (tg_alt Un) (S (2 * N)))
Series = fun a : nat -> R => real (Lim_seq (sum_n a)) : (nat -> R) -> R Argument scope is [function_scope]
tech3 : forall (k : R) (N : nat), k <> 1 -> sum_f_R0 (fun i : nat => k ^ i) N = (1 - k ^ S N) / (1 - k)
tech6 : forall (An : nat -> R) (k : R) (N : nat), 0 <= k -> (forall i : nat, An (S i) < k * An i) -> sum_f_R0 An N <= An 0%nat * sum_f_R0 (fun i : nat => k ^ i) N
cv_cvabs : forall (Un : nat -> R) (l : R), Un_cv Un l -> Un_cv (fun i : nat => Rabs (Un i)) (Rabs l)
Pser = fun (An : nat -> R) (x l : R) => infinite_sum (fun n : nat => An n * x ^ n) l : (nat -> R) -> R -> R -> Prop Argument scopes are [function_scope R_scope R_scope]
BinNatDef.N.div_eucl = fun a b : N => match a with | 0%N => (0%N, 0%N) | N.pos na => match b with | 0%N => (0%N, a) | N.pos _ => BinNatDef.N.pos_div_eucl na b end end : N -> N -> N * N Argument scopes are [N_scope N_scope]
cv_infty_cv_R0 : forall Un : nat -> R, (forall n : nat, Un n <> 0) -> cv_infty Un -> Un_cv (fun n : nat => / Un n) 0
sum_eq : forall (An Bn : nat -> R) (N : nat), (forall i : nat, (i <= N)%nat -> An i = Bn i) -> sum_f_R0 An N = sum_f_R0 Bn N
sum_Rle : forall (An Bn : nat -> R) (N : nat), (forall n : nat, (n <= N)%nat -> An n <= Bn n) -> sum_f_R0 An N <= sum_f_R0 Bn N

```coq
intros l.
intros H.
destruct H as [l' H'].
apply H'.
Qed.```

original: intros l. intros H. destruct H as [l' H']. apply H'.
